content.html: I loved seeing how one explained BGP as a road to a neighbourhood which just gets deleted - the neighbourhood is still there but you cannot get there. It is so simple and beautiful way to explain what is happening for people who aren't interested of "internet stuff".
content.value:
I loved seeing how one explained BGP as a road to a neighbourhood which just gets deleted - the neighbourhood is still there but you cannot get there.

It is so simple and beautiful way to explain what is happening for people who aren't interested of "internet stuff".
